name: AISHA
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May all your dreams come true my princess! <3)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Dumbass, Princess DODO!!...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then I thought, don't be mean shuaib.
text4: And I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
